main event: A witness observed a bright, silvery light in the sky near Boise, Idaho on the evening of July 7, 1968, which displayed erratic movements and high speed before disappearing.
interesting points: The object made sharp right-angle turns that conventional aircraft cannot perform., The sighting lasted approximately 2-3 minutes before the object vanished., The witness was driving alone when the sighting occurred and felt shaken afterward., Weather conditions were clear with visibility unlimited at the time of the observation., No other aircraft were reported in the area during the sighting.
sighted object: a bright, silvery light in the sky
witness description: a civilian observer who was driving along the highway
